title: Riot should add an Amount Shielded at endgame stats
body: Every time I play {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} or {{champion:99}} (and some others). I always wonder how much damage I've shielded on myself and other during the game. Since there is an Amount Healed stat, please Riot add an Amount Shielded stat. It will help understanding if I'm wasting shields or I'm shielding properly. Anyone else feel the same?

I would like a stat where you see how much dmg the shields have taken for your teammates instead. Allot of shields just doesnt do anything as they are put on others at the wrong time. Having a stat where you see how much damage your shield have taken would be better as you can see how much your shield have helped your team.
This is what I mean. Guess I didn't write it correctly. But yes it should show only the damage that has been shielded not how much shield you put out.

I would love for this to happen. But I have been saying this for years. Sadly I don't have any faith in Riot ever implementing this.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/7YFh7OL8-can-we-have-a-damage-shielded-stat-in-the-end-game-lobby
Then we'll just have to kept trying util Riot hears us!

What about "Damage Prevented?" Might be easier to have just shielded numbers (in which case just shield numbers would be awesome), but it would be cool to know how much damage was stopped w/ skills that aren't shields. Getting a kayle ult off on someone who is tanking 5 ults isn't shield, but it is a great damage prevention and a huge swing compared to ulting a random champ in the fountain. Ali ult, and stuff like gragas drink would count too bc using those at the right time is a huge diff in skill.
Shouldn't {{champion:82}} be the first to come to thought?
Damage shielded: all of them

Since they added the ability for the locket to track how much it has shielded verse damage absorbed, it would not be to hard for them to record variables for other shields as well and display both types of data in the stats at the end of the game. Riot please do those final tweaks. :D
As a Janna main, I'd also like to see a "damage prevented" stat show up.

That number is already displayed >.>

I would love to see how much my support shields help, but I would hate to know just how minuscule they are in comparison to a Riven or Nautilus...or Rumble.  Basically any non-support with a shield.  I think supports drew the short stick when it came to shields potency.
Yeah very sad.
And a damage negated counter, for the amount of damage shaved off by building resists.
{{champion:72}}
that would be nice for Sona too

I would preferred to see a damage absorbed counter.



Damage that your shields successfully prevented from happening.

Also, if damage taken isn't already pre-mitigation, they should add a separate stat for that.  Tanks would be much more excited to soak damage if they weren't punished in their postgame numbers for building defenses like they should.
That would be interesting. I guess Barrier and items would be added to that as well.

Also, because I am all about that data, can we get an export stats to .csv option? It'd help make it a lot easier for me to track progression and then I could pivot up how in doing on champs/maps/modes/roles/ect so that I could have a quick snapshot on my progression based on a number of factors. Might be asking for a bit much here, but manually entering in data after each match is a pain!

Always thought it would be nice to see damage shielded for the karma, lux, sion, etc. 
Also, damage mitigated by type (to show impact of mr and armor, especially for tanks).
Yes please.

Bump, I would really like to see this, it could also give supports a little more viability against those people in end game "look at all the damage the support didn't do when compared to the other support yet you blocked way more damage than they did.

The only issue is things that increase armor and mr don't "shield" a better title may be damage mitigated but that would talk a larger formula
